_description: OGC Extractor Config - Used by ogc_values_extractor.py to parse RequestParams from BIMFabrikHH_UI and map them to IFC properties
_defaults_description: Fallback values for extract_project_info() when UI doesn't provide values
_container_ids_description: Container IDs to match against RequestParams.containers[].containerId
_pset_prefix_description: Prefix for extract_psets_basepoint() to find property set containers
_component_keys_description: Component titles/keys to match in container.components
